    • Method Detail

      • draw

        static void draw(Graphics2D g,
        Painter.ImageEnum partType,
        long currentTime,
        Movement movement,
        boolean useCenterPoint)
        Basic draw method. Images rotate about their center point.
        Parameters:
        g - - graphics object to draw to
        partType - - enum to determine which image to draw
        currentTime -
        movement - - location of the image
        useCenterPoint - - if true, uses the movement object to determine where the center of the image will be, if false, where the upper left corner of the image will be

      • draw

        static void draw(Graphics2D g,
        Painter.ImageEnum partType,
        int desiredWidth,
        int desiredHeight,
        long currentTime,
        Movement movement,
        boolean useCenterPoint)
        Draws and scales. Images rotate about their center point.
        Parameters:
        g - - graphics object to draw to
        partType - - enum to determine which image to draw
        desiredWidth - - scaled width - if -1, width is automatically scaled to maintain aspect ratio
        desiredHeight - - scaled height - if -1, height is automatically scaled to maintain aspect ratio
        currentTime -
        movement - - location of the image
        useCenterPoint - - if true, uses the movement object to determine where the center of the image will be, if false, where the upper left corner of the image will be

      • getScaledWidth

        public static int getScaledWidth(Painter.ImageEnum partType,
                 double desiredHeight)
        Returns the width of an image that was scaled using automatic width scaling to maintain aspect ratio
        Parameters:
        partType - - enum to identify which image was used
        desiredHeight - - the height the image was scaled to
        Returns:

      • getScaledHeight

        public static int getScaledHeight(Painter.ImageEnum partType,
                  double desiredWidth)
        Returns the height of an image that was scaled using automatic height scaling to maintain aspect ratio
        Parameters:
        partType - - enum to identify which image was used
        desiredWidth - - the width the image was scaled to
        Returns:

      • scaleImage

        public static BufferedImage scaleImage(BufferedImage img,
                       int desiredWidth,
                       int desiredHeight)
        Scales an image
        Parameters:
        img - - the image to be scaled
        desiredWidth - - if -1, width is scaled automatically to maintain aspect ratio
        desiredHeight - - if -1, height is scaled automatically to maintain aspect ratio
        Returns:
        the resulting scaled image

      • cropImage

        public static BufferedImage cropImage(BufferedImage img,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Crops an image
        Parameters:
        img - - the image to be cropped
        x - - coordinate of the upper left corner of the crop
        y - - coordinate of the upper left corner of the crop
        width - - width of the crop (width of the desired end image)
        height - - height of the crop (height of the desired end image)
        Returns:
        the resulting cropped image
